stdout:
Table	Create Table
opportunities	CREATE TABLE `opportunities` (
  `id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT,
  `leadId` int(11) DEFAULT NULL,
  `name` varchar(255) COLLATE utf8mb4_unicode_ci NOT NULL,
  `companyName` varchar(255) COLLATE utf8mb4_unicode_ci NOT NULL,
  `contactName` varchar(255) COLLATE utf8mb4_unicode_ci NOT NULL,
  `phone` varchar(50) COLLATE utf8mb4_unicode_ci DEFAULT NULL,
  `email` varchar(320) COLLATE utf8mb4_unicode_ci DEFAULT NULL,
  `stage` enum('qualified','proposal','negotiation','closed_won','closed_lost') COLLATE utf8mb4_unicode_ci NOT NULL DEFAULT 'qualified',
  `dealValue` varchar(100) COLLATE utf8mb4_unicode_ci DEFAULT NULL,
  `probability` int(11) DEFAULT '50',
  `expectedCloseDate` timestamp NULL DEFAULT NULL,
  `actualCloseDate` timestamp NULL DEFAULT NULL,
  `ownerId` int(11) NOT NULL,
  `notes` text COLLATE utf8mb4_unicode_ci DEFAULT NULL,
  `lossReason` varchar(255) COLLATE utf8mb4_unicode_ci DEFAULT NULL,
  `createdAt` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  `updatedAt` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  PRIMARY KEY (`id`) /*T![clustered_index] CLUSTERED */,
  KEY `opportunities_leadId_fk` (`leadId`),
  KEY `opportunities_ownerId_fk` (`ownerId`),
  CONSTRAINT `opportunities_leadId_fk` FOREIGN KEY (`leadId`) REFERENCES `BMkvRPynGy4odLDciqESQg`.`leads` (`id`),
  CONSTRAINT `opportunities_ownerId_fk` FOREIGN KEY (`ownerId`) REFERENCES `BMkvRPynGy4odLDciqESQg`.`users` (`id`)
) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb4 COLLATE=utf8mb4_unicode_ci AUTO_INCREMENT=90001
